inputs.selection_motivation: The brent–ust2y influence is the weakest link; short‑term Treasury yields are driven primarily by Fed policy and are only weakly correlated with oil price, adding little new cross‑asset insight compared to the other handles.

prioritized_link.motivation: Brent oil price movements shape long‑term inflation expectations and risk‑premium dynamics, which in turn drive the 30‑year Treasury yield curve; linking brent to ust30y captures this causal path.
